thread.title: The world reacts to the Apple launch
thread.title_full: The world reacts to the Apple launch

title: The world reacts to the Apple launch
text:
How Twitter reacted to the announcements made Apple’s product launch MATTHEW DUNN news.com.au How Twitter reacted to the announcements made Apple’s product launch MATTHEW DUNN news.com.au New iPhones, iPad Pro and Apple TV 2:09 
Everything you need to know about Apple's latest products, including the iPhone 6s, iPad Pro and Apple TV January 1st 1970 46 years ago /video/video.news.com.au/News/ 
EARLIER this morning, Apple held its biggest day of product announcements this year in which it unveiled two new iPhones, a bigger iPad and an updated Apple TV. 
As expected, Twitter was thrown into overdrive with punters jumping on the opportunity to comment on Apple’s announcements. 
The biggest news of the day was Apple’s iPhone 6s and 6s Plus and people seemed excited about everything but the cost. Other Stories
